title: Thrilling Experience
review: The Paragliding is an thrilling, a once in a life time adventure. It's a must to for everyone visiting Bhimtal.

title: A must try adventure if in nainital or bhimtal...
review: They are highly trained and professionals.. And it's without risk... Go there.. For all. Persons between 15 kgs to 100 kilos...  The lighter the person the longer the flight... Slight wind is highly favorable..

title: Para gliding
review: The Para gliding is all related to the weather on a particular day.

title: Really nice experience
review: I really enjoyed the paragliding experience with Eagle Eye.

title: Best experience for adrenaline rush.
review: Loved the experience. Amazing staff at Eagle Eye Adventure. Proper training and completely safe.

title: Best Paragliding Site in the Vicinity
review: I had a wonderful flight yesterday flew for almost 10 minutes as briefed by the pilot, this was my second fly with these guys, witnessed a mesmerizing valley and lake view from the top, will surely recommend to others.

title: Paragliding
review: Very satisfied experience. All staffs are very helpful.See total vally and two most popular lake from takeoff point.Overall experience is thrilling and enjoyable.

title: Travel
review: Nice experience of paragliding with experienced pilot and people here are helpful also. It was also worthy according to cost of it. Enjoyed

title: Biggest attraction
review: Eagle eye one of best adventure sports operators of Bhimtal specially for paragliding near pandeygaon in between Bhimtal and Naukushiatal. they have the most modern gliding gears with very expert crews one can depend on easily because paragliding is very dangerous sport. Very bad news is for quite some time paragliding is banned by Govt. for security reasons.

title: Must do but overpriced
review: The experience is awesome but they charged a lot then they also ask for money for videos and picture if you want.

title: Worst experience of our life
review: It was a horrible adventure as per price as well as on ride. The flight was only 3 min and when asked for photos as they said will be given down start to ask Money. So I wouldn't recommend to come if wanna try as all details way before booking.
